name.ja: <ruby>絢<rt>けん</rt></ruby><ruby>嵐<rt>らん</rt></ruby><ruby>渦<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>麗<rt>れい</rt></ruby>ヴァルルーン

text.en: If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When your opponent activates a monster effect and you have "Mystical Space Typhoon" in your GY (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then if you have 2 or more "Mystical Space Typhoon" in your GY, you can destroy that monster. If "Mystical Space Typhoon" is activated while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Magnifistorm Vortex Beauty Valrune" once per turn.
